name: Isleguard
description:
Note: This game is currently undergoing it's public beta period, any feedback is highly appreciated!

Welcome...

To Isleguard!

  • Protect your island's beacons from waves of blimps
  • Manage your limited resources to mount a formidable defense
  • Fight back with bolts, stones and even lightning!

Controls (Keyboard and Mouse Only)

  • Left mouse to interact
  • Right mouse to drag camera
  • Escape to pause game

Currently this project is still a work in progress, and under development. 

Contact me (ScarabDev) via my Gmail or view my projects and dev updates on Instagram!
